trans-unit.source: Annotates the returned result of a user-defined type (UDT) with additional information that can be used in Transact-SQL.
trans-unit.target: 標註的使用者定義型別 (UDT) 的其他資訊可以在 TRANSACT-SQL 中使用傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: SqlFacetAttribute may only be specified on non-void return values.
trans-unit.target: 只能指定 SqlFacetAttribute 在非 void 傳回值。

trans-unit.source: SqlFacetAttribute is used only to derive information about the return type, and is not intended to be a constraint specification on what can be stored in the type.
trans-unit.target: SqlFacetAttribute 只用於衍生資訊的傳回型別，而且不是要在儲存的內容類型中的條件約束規格。

trans-unit.source: Thus, if a field has a SqlFacetAttribute indicating its size to be 2 characters, then the SQL Server type of the field access expression is of size 2, but assignments into the field are not restricted by this facet.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果欄位有 SqlFacetAttribute 指出其大小是 2 個字元，欄位存取運算式的 SQL Server 型別則的大小為 2，但到欄位的指派不會受到這個 facet。

trans-unit.source: The table below captures the matrix of valid values for the various properties for specific field types.
trans-unit.target: 下表會擷取有效的特定欄位類型的各種屬性值的矩陣。

trans-unit.source: In this table, "Y" indicates that the property is valid, and "N" indicates that the property is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 下表中"Y"表示屬性有效，"N"表示屬性無效。

trans-unit.source: The specified SqlFacetAttribute must be compatible with the field type.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 SqlFacetAttribute 必須與欄位型別相容。

trans-unit.source: If the property is not valid, type registration will report an error if the user specifies a non-default value for the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不是有效的型別註冊會報告錯誤，如果使用者指定非預設值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum values for <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> properties are 38.
trans-unit.target: 最大值為<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>屬性為 38。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> </xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A> property, the value should be in the range of 1-8000 for binary and non-Unicode data, 1-4000 for Unicode data, or -1.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>屬性值應該在 1-8000 二進位和非 Unicode 資料，1-4000 Unicode 資料，則為-1 的範圍內。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: All other values are not valid.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他值不是有效的。

trans-unit.source: |Type|IsFixedLength|MaxSize|Precision|Scale|IsNullable| |----------|-------------------|-------------|---------------|-----------|----------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal>|N|N|Y|Y|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Embedded UDTs|N|N|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.String>|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Byte[]|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |Char[]|Y|Y|N|N|Y| |<xref:System.DateTime>|N|N|N|Y<sup>1</sup>|N| |<xref:System.Decimal>|N|N|Y|Y|Y| (1) Specifying the scale on a DateTime type will cause the value to be returned to Transact-SQL as a DateTime2 type with the specified scale.
trans-unit.target: |型別 |IsFixedLength |MaxSize |有效位數 |小數位數 |IsNullable | |----------|-------------------|-------------|---------------|-----------|----------------| |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal>|N |N |Y |Y |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString>|Y |Y |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary>|Y |Y |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml>|N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes>|Y |Y |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars>|Y |Y |N |N |Y | |內嵌 Udt |N |N |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.String>|Y |Y |N |N |Y | |Byte [] |Y |Y |N |N |Y | |Char [] |Y |Y |N |N |Y | |<xref:System.DateTime>|N |N |N |Y<sup>1</sup>|N | |<xref:System.Decimal>|N |N |Y |Y |Y | （1） 是 DateTime 型別上指定標尺將會導致 TRANSACT-SQL 傳回為指定的小數位數 DateTime2 類型的值。</xref:System.Decimal> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlChars> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBytes> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlXml> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBinary> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlString> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDecimal> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlGuid> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlMoney> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDateTime> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlDouble> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlSingle> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt64> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt32> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlInt16> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlByte> </xref:System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlBoolean>

trans-unit.source: An optional attribute on a user-defined type (UDT) return type, used to annotate the returned result with additional information that can be used in Transact-SQL.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義型別 (UDT) 上的選擇性屬性會傳回型別、 用來標註的其他資訊可以在 TRANSACT-SQL 中使用傳回的結果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the return type of the user-defined type is of a fixed length.
trans-unit.target: 指出使用者定義類型的傳回型別是否為固定長度。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to `false` if the <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A> property is set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須設定為`false`如果<xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>屬性設定為 1。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.MaxSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the return type is of a fixed length; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳回型別是固定的長度。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the return type of the user-defined type can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否可為使用者定義類型的傳回型別<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the return type of the user-defined type can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者定義類型的傳回型別可以是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size, in logical units, of the underlying field type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: 大小上限，以邏輯單位，表示使用者定義型別的基礎的欄位類型。

trans-unit.source: Logical unit is bytes (with a maximum size of 8000) for the binary and non-Unicode data types, and the number of Unicode characters (with a maximum size of 4000) for the character field types.
trans-unit.target: 邏輯單位為位元組 （最大大小為 8000） 的二進位檔和非 Unicode 資料類型，以及 （具有最大大小為 4000） 用於字元欄位類型的 Unicode 字元的數目。

trans-unit.source: The value -1 is reserved for large character and binary types.
trans-unit.target: 值-1 被保留供大型字元和二進位型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4000 for Unicode character types and 8000 for binary and non-Unicode types.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 Unicode 字元類型 4000 和 8000 二進位和非 Unicode 的類型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the maximum size, in logical units, of the underlying field type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示最大的大小，以邏輯單位，表示基礎的欄位類型。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The precision of the return type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義型別之傳回型別的有效位數。

trans-unit.source: The Precision property is valid only for numeric types.
trans-unit.target: 有效位數屬性是僅適用於數字型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A> property must also be specified when setting the Precision property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>屬性也必須指定設定的有效位數屬性時。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Scale%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the Precision property is 38; the default value is 38.
trans-unit.target: 有效位數屬性的最大值為 38。預設值為 38。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the precision of the return type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表傳回類型的有效位數。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The scale of the return type of the user-defined type.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義型別之傳回型別的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The Scale property is valid only for decimal types.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數屬性無效，只為 decimal 類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A> property must also be specified when setting the Scale property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>設定小數位數屬性時，必須也指定屬性。</xref:Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFacetAttribute.Precision%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the Scale property is 38; the default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 小數位數屬性的最大值為 38。預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the scale of the return type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表小數位數的傳回型別。</xref:System.Int32>
